thread.section_title: The NoMad Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A brief respite
thread.title_full: A brief respite - Review of The NoMad Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Pete C
title: A brief respite
text:
Coolest of the cool. This hotel makes me feel as if i have gone back in time. Beautifully appointed, fantastic service, awesome food. Worth it, worth it, worth it!
This is our second trip to the Nomad and each time I have been amazed with the restuarant and bar. The specialty drinks are well made and tasty. The menu is just plain cool but wonderful. Come here to feel pampered, come here to feel cool, come here and turn the cell phone off!
